original_title: Steven Wilson - The Raven That Refused To Sing and Other Stories
overview: The Raven That Refused to Sing (And Other Stories) is the third solo album by Steven Wilson, released by Kscope on 25 February 2013. Each track on the album is based on a story of the supernatural. Alan Parsons, who had previously been involved in the creation of Pink Floydâ€™s The Dark Side of the Moon, was responsible for engineering the album.
title: Steven Wilson - The Raven That Refused To Sing and Other Stories
